events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but it still hasn't arrived and the tracking hasn't updated in days.
The case was identified to relate to a delivery delay based on the customer's report of late shipping.
The case has been assigned to customer service representative Sarah to assist with the delayed shipment.
Hello! My name is Sarah. I'm here to help you with your delayed order. Can you please provide your order number?
To look into the status of your shipment, could you please confirm the order number and the shipping address?
Sure, the order number is 123456789, and it was supposed to be shipped to 123 Elm Street, Springfield.
I've checked the tracking system and it appears the shipment was delayed due to a logistics issue. We expect delivery within the next 3 days.
Thank you for the update. I understand these things happen, but I hope it arrives soon as I needed it earlier.
The package was delivered today. We are glad the issue is resolved and apologize for the inconvenience caused.
Checking in to ensure your order arrived in good condition and to see if you need any further assistance.
Since your order has been received and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
